FuncDef: This command creates the context to configure an OSPF area. An area is a collection of network segments within an AS that have been administratively grouped together. The area ID can be specified in dotted decimal notation or as a 32-bit decimal integer.

ParaDef.Info: The OSPF area ID expressed in dotted decimal notation or as a 32-bit decimal integer. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (dotted decimal).

ExtraInfo: Default: no area - No OSPF areas are defined.
